description: The Rex short-sleeved shirt is a must-add basic thanks to the lightweight and breathable blend of organic cotton and recycled poly, and the always-appreciated front pocket. Add the subtle stripe to elevate the basic silhouette, and you have a versatile, refined, dependable style all season long. Bonus: this men's t-shirt was made in a Fair Trade Certified™ Factory, meaning the people who made it received an additional premium for their work.
name: Prana Rex SS Crew - Slim - Mens
